abstract: [Excerpt] Thanks to Joseph McCartin for advancing this debate with an insightful critique of the workers-rights-as-human-rights framework and for his generous treatment of the series of Human Rights Watch reports in which I had a hand. McCartin so fairly presents the human rights case, even while disagreeing with it, that its hard to respond without simply borrowing from his framing of my own views. But Ill try.
title: Solidarity and Rights: Two to Tango: A Response to Joseph A. McCartin
subject: law
